compliant.section: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and modalities of information; Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: Consent By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

non_compliant.section: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Groundhog Technologies / Groundhog Inc.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that it applies to both online and offline data processing activities, if applicable. It should also specify if data is collected directly from the user or from other sources.

non_compliant.section: This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that it applies to both online and offline data processing activities, if applicable. It should also specify if data is collected directly from the user or from other sources.

non_compliant.section: These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable.
non_compliant.amend: Even if not directly linked, the policy should clarify how they ensure that log files are not used to identify individuals, especially considering potential combination with other data.

non_compliant.section: Advertising Partners Privacy Policies You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of https://www .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide clear and accessible information about each third-party advertising partner, their data processing purposes, and legal basis for processing data. Simply referring to a list might not be sufficient.
